VNTZ-M.TA.summary: Vonetize Plc provides content services on video on demand, linear channels, and over the top platforms. It provides various series, films, children's programs, enrichment, entertainment and recreation, sports, music, culture and nature science, and other contents. The company was formerly known as Fixlight T.V. Ltd and changed its name to Vonetize Plc in April 2016. Vonetize Plc was founded in 2011 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
